name: Flowbo
headline: Pipe for online businesses
description:
Flowbo provides financing to online revenue-generating companies including creators and eCommerce. 

We package assets into investable products so creators can raise money. For example, we package receivables into factoring products.

founders.name: Daniel Kang, Founder
founders.description:
Daniel is co-founder of Flowbo, marketplace that provides financing to influencers and allow fans to share in their success. In the past, Daniel was an investment professional at Softbank Vision Fund focused on fintech investments, and served as a Board Observer of Auto1 Group (ETR: AG1). 

Formally, he studied policy and finance at University of Oxford and McGill University. As an immigrant founder from a modest background, Daniel has strong interest is accessibility to capital.

# Fast, Frictionless Fundingfor Creators’ Success
### Unlock your creative potential with Flowbo. 
[Join the Beta](https://www.flowbo.co/<#contact-form>)
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cb9a5e2866ab2388e63e80_Group%2018.png)
## Break down the barrier to funding your growth
You need capital to succeed as a creator. Banks and other financial institutions may not understand you. But we do. We get the true value of your work.
## Get paid on time for your work
Flowbo helps you get paid early from platforms, brands, and sponsors without waiting for the 30-60-90 days they require. 
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cb70b601ec5d29c00166d1_Group%2017.png)
## A Win-Win Funding System
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cba091815ce5cbdac8f6c9_Group%2019.png)
### Upload Your Invoices
Upload your signed contracts and invoices for your brand deals
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cba1580563ed1506a2550b_Group%2021%402x.png)
### Review your offer
We’ll offer you terms with 1-4% fees. If you're happy with it, accept!
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cba14649d6df96ea56bb14_Group%2020%402x.png)
### Get paid TODAY
Connect your bank account and receive your money today. Don't wait months to get paid for work you've done.
## We’ve Funded These Creators’ Success
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cb6fd1c13abce3a8384440_Group%204.png)
### HeadNulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula, eget lacinia odio sem nec elit. Pus sit amet fermentum. Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Etiam porta sem malesuada magna mollis euismod.ing
Joshua Home
**New York Times**
## Backed by Trusted Investors
We are backed by experienced and trusted investors such as Jonas Templstein, the co-founder of the digital banking startup Monzo, as well as HOF Capital and Unshackled Ventures. 
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60ccb68500a75d75b92abdf6_Group%2026.png)
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60ccb8b9c2114046288b7d84_60ca7661e80bcdef2ed84a90_HOF%20logo-p-500.png)
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60ccb8e55ba4759b7b161307_60ca75873cddfd838e20425d_Unshackled%20Logo-p-500.png)
## Ready to Grow as a Creator?
Join the waitlist to get funded instantly.
First name *
Last name *
 **Link to your YouTube Channel***
Email
Your desired amount of funding*
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
# Frequently Asked Questions
**How do I apply for funding?**
We're currently running a private beta. If you want to be included, make sure you join sign-up to be included! 
**How quickly will I receive my funding?**
Within minutes! From the moment you sign the offer and link your bank account, we you will receive your funding in within minutes.
**Can I apply if I'm outside the US?**
Currently we are only available in the US. We're working hard to expand into your country to work with amazing creators everywhere! If you're working with a talent agency or MCN, we may be able to help you!
**How much funding can I expect to receive?**
Once you put your application through, we’ll make assessments based on how much you are making right now, and offer you an amount. This process should take a few hours.
**Why do I need to connect my accounts with Flowbo?**
In order provide the most amount of funding at the best rates, we need to understand your monetization and related stats on your platforms
**How does Flowbo access my channel data?**
Platforms like YouTube and Twitch are well prepared for products like Flowbo to pull channel data via APIs. You can read about the [APIs and metrics we'll use from YouTube](https://www.flowbo.co/<https:/developers.google.com/youtube/analytics/metrics>).
**Is it safe for Flowbo to have access to this?**
We understand that privacy and security is a concern and we'd never encourage people to do something that we felt was unsafe. We want to be very transparent and clear about how things would work and how we'd keep things safe and secure.Flowbo never gets your login information: You sign in via [Google and YouTube's secure OAuth servers](https://www.flowbo.co/<https:/developers.google.com/youtube/v3/guides/authentication>) and they send us an _access token_. We use the same mechanism as most sites that offer login with Google, FB, Twitter, etc.‍You choose what level of permissions Flowbo has: YouTube will prompt you and ask you to confirm all the permissions you'd allow Flowbo to have access to. We'll ask for permissions highlighted in green below.
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60ccd404b00b5f0c8d06b735_Youtube_API_Permissions_Highlighted.png)
You have the control to revoke access at any time
**Are there any fees?**
Yes. We charge a small 5 - 15% fee depending on the funding amount as well as your level of recurring revenue.
**Is this a loan?**
Nope! We don’t have any fixed obligations, and we just have a flat fee.
**How do I repay the funding?**
Repayment is done by sharing with us a percentage of your total monthly revenue from all income streams you connect on Flowbo.
**Can I repay faster if I want to?**
Sometimes you're on a rocket ship! If you want to repay faster, you can write us a note asking us to share a larger amount of your revenue and we will do so!
**If I don’t make any money for a certain month, do I still have to make a payment?**
We understand that your income may fluctuate from month to month. Any percentage of zero is still zero!
**Do I have to make any commitments in terms of the content I make?**
Not at all! At Flowbo we believe in giving you full creative control to unlock your potential. There are no requirements at all when it comes to the content you make. You can make as many videos as you see fit with our funding, as long as it’s what you want to do!
**What if I want more funding after I repay everything?**
At Flowbo, we want to grow with you. This means that if you want further funding, we are happy to have you again! Just apply the same way you have, and we’ll get the capital you need. You can also ask for more funding while you're still on the income share schedule with us.
I have sponsorship deals that are slow to pay me. Can Flowbo help get me my money faster?
Yes we can! We've helped creators who rely on sponsorship deals get paid faster. Our process is quick and easy: just contact us at founders@flowbo.co
**How can I contact you for more help?**
Whenever you have any questions or concerns, you can email us at founders@flowbo.co
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cb64fa20a93418b234363f_Flowbo-Colors.png)
[About Us](https://www.flowbo.co/</about-us>)[Privacy Policy](https://www.flowbo.co/</privacy-policy>)[Terms of Service](https://www.flowbo.co/</terms-of-service>)
## Break down the barrier to funding your growth
You need capital to succeed as a creator. Banks and other financial institutions may not understand you. But we do. Your numbers are music to our ears, and we understand the true value of your business.
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/60cb5f56c3b31702dd6b1934/60cb708ef74c309e064a8f09_Group%2016.png)

generated_description:
**Flowbo: Paving the Way for Online Creators**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the innovation hub of Los Angeles, Flowbo is a fintech startup that serves as a funding lifeline for online businesses, particularly creators and eCommerce ventures. With its forward-thinking approach, it seeks to act as a "pipe" to fill the funding gap that many creators face. They're part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, which gives them street cred in the startup world.

**Mission and Offerings**

Flowbo understands that traditional banks often overlook the unique financial identities of creators. That’s why they package various revenue streams—like receivables—into investable products, allowing creators to access capital more flexibly and quickly. Whether your funding needs stem from sponsorships or eCommerce sales, Flowbo’s model is tailored to assist you in getting paid sooner, without the traditional delays of 30 to 90 days. 

Here's how it works:
1. **Upload Invoices**: Creators can upload their signed contracts and invoices.
2. **Review Offers**: After evaluation, Flowbo presents funding options with manageable fees ranging from 1-4%.
3. **Instant Payment**: Once you agree to the terms and link your account, funds are transferred often within minutes.

This model provides a frictionless experience for creators who need immediate cash flow without the cumbersome hoops of traditional financing.

**Backing and Growth**

Flowbo has garnered attention from seasoned investors like Jonas Templstein of Monzo fame, HOF Capital, and Unshackled Ventures, adding credibility to its mission. The company operates with a compact team of two, which makes for a lean, focused operation.

**Why Flowbo?**

- **Creator-Centric Approach**: The company prides itself on understanding creators’ true value—an insight often lost on traditional banks.
- **Control and Flexibility**: Creators retain full creative control, without stringent commitments to content.
- **Ease of Access**: With an intuitive platform and a keen understanding of the creator economy, Flowbo is positioning itself as the go-to funding solution.

**Join the Movement**

Aspiring or established creators looking for funding clarity can join Flowbo’s private beta on their website [Flowbo.co](https://www.flowbo.co/). This is more than just financial help; it's about unlocking potential in the burgeoning creator economy.

In a nutshell, Flowbo isn’t just helping creators get funded; they’re reshaping how funding is perceived and accessed in the digital age. It's an exciting time for online entrepreneurs, and Flowbo is at the forefront of their success.
